CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(( Total_Soft_Credits_This_Calendar_Year__pc + Total_Gifts_This_Calendar_Year__pc )>= ( Total_Soft_Credits_Last_Calendar_Year__pc + Total_Gifts_Last_Calendar_Year__pc ), ( Total_Soft_Credits_This_Calendar_Year__pc + Total_Gifts_This_Calendar_Year__pc)>= (Total_Soft_Credits_2_Calendar_Years_Ago__c + Total_Gifts_Two_Calendar_Years_Ago__c) ), Total_Soft_Credits_This_Calendar_Year__pc + Total_Gifts_This_Calendar_Year__pc,
IF ( AND((Total_Soft_Credits_Last_Calendar_Year__pc + Total_Gifts_Last_Calendar_Year__pc)> (Total_Soft_Credits_Last_Calendar_Year__pc + Total_Gifts_Last_Calendar_Year__pc), (Total_Soft_Credits_Last_Calendar_Year__pc + Total_Gifts_Last_Calendar_Year__pc) >= (Total_Soft_Credits_2_Calendar_Years_Ago__c + Total_Gifts_Two_Calendar_Years_Ago__c) ), Total_Soft_Credits_This_Calendar_Year__pc + Total_Gifts_Last_Calendar_Year__pc, Total_Soft_Credits_2_Calendar_Years_Ago__c + Total_Gifts_Two_Calendar_Years_Ago__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The sum of all (hard/soft credit) gifts made by this Account in its "best giving year" out of the last 3 CYs (i.e. this year, last year and two years ago). Used in the automation that set Donor Ladder (See mass-actions scheduler app)
CustomField.label: High Combined Last 3 CY (for Ladder)
